AttributeCategoryAttribute.name: AttributeCategoryAttribute
AttributeCategoryAttribute.description: Represents a relationship between an attribute category and the attribute definition.

AttributeCategoryId.description: The ID of the attribute category that the attribute is associated with. The ID is unique within the organization.

AttributeDefinitionId.description: The ID of the attribute definition associated with the attribute category. The ID is unique within the organization.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date the attribute category attribute was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date the attribute category attribute was last viewed.

Name.description: A unique name for the attribute. The maximum length is 80 characters (of any type).

OwnerId.description: The owner of the attribute category attribute.

AttributeCategoryAttribute.accessRules: Product Catalog Management must be enabled to access this object.
